title: Hello there!
par1: My name is Aleksandra and I have more than
par2: years of experience as a professional cleaner. I have been working together with my team for
par3: years here in Stockholm. Currently we offer almost all types of cleaning. We have a partnership with the insurance company Trygg-Hansa - this means that we offers compensation for events that caused damage when we performed our work at the customer's place or if keys were to go missing.
sd2: Spring/major cleaning or unplanned visits from relatives? It's no problem for us, call and we'll help you!
sd3: Everyone dreams of breathtaking views from home. From spring to autumn, we clean windows quickly and nicely.
sd4: Refrigerator, freezer, oven, etc. - ask us and then we adapt our services to your individual needs.
c1h2: Do you want to become our customer?
c1h3: Below you will find information about how our collaboration will take place.
c1p1: In the first step, I will carry out a free customer visit where, among other things, I will look at how big your accommodation is and assess your needs. You will then receive a price proposal (fixed price incl. VAT after RUT deduction - check the Swedish Tax Agency's website for what this means). The customer receives the RUT deduction directly on the invoice and thus pays the price shown above after the RUT deduction. ALEKSANDRA CISLOWSKI St√§dfirma administers the RUT deduction directly with the Swedish Tax Agency. If the RUT deduction is not approved by the Swedish Tax Agency, the customer will be charged for the full amount.
c1p2: Depending on your needs, you can choose between two different cleaning packages:
c1p3: We work with cleaning materials that you buy yourself at home. The team can recommend and adapt the products to your individual needs. Link to the list of cleaning materials that we usually use during house cleaning can be found
c1p4: As we do not want to damage your floors, we do not move heavy furniture when we clean, for example sofas, cabinets, etc. If you wish to clean behind or under any furniture, you are welcome to move it yourself before we come and clean.
c1p5: NOTE: Balcony cleaning is included in extra services.
c1p6: We have a collaboration with the insurance company Trygg-Hansa. This means that we offer compensation for events that caused damage when we performed our work at the customer's place or if keys were to go missing.
c1p7: The contract is a permanent contract with no notice period.
c1p8: If you are unsure about hiring recurring cleaning help, we are happy to offer trial cleaning.
c1p9: We look forward to a future collaboration and to helping you evoke the feeling of a fragrant and freshly cleaned home!
c1p10: Cleaning materials needed during house cleaning:
c1li14: bucket with mop - preferably one that you don't have to wring out with your hands (not a damp mop)
c1p11: Other services (e.g. window cleaning, refrigerator cleaning) have a separate price. If the booked service does not have its own price (such as cleaning the fridge or oven), we work by the hour and the hourly price is SEK 200/h. Please note that this price does not correspond to the customer's fixed price for a home cleaning (one cleaning session).
c1p12: Maybe you would also like to see:
c2p1: This type of cleaning requires individual assessment and depends on where you live, what help do you want and what we can recommend could be done. Send me a signal and we'll agree on a plan!
c2p2: You purchase normal cleaning materials yourself, but if you need more powerful equipment, we provide it!
c3p1: If you are already our customer, one-time window cleaning costs the same as one occasion of a regular house cleaning.
c3p2: Contact us if you are a new customer and need our help with window cleaning.
c3p3: We use professional equipment (K√§rcher). We also use telescopic handles and of course we take a ladder with us so that we can access high windows.
c3p4: When we take care of your windows, you don't need to prepare anything - vases and decorations on window frames or fine curtains are not a challenge for our team.
c3p5: NOTE: Balcony cleaning is included in extra services.
c4p1: Does your fridge smell bad? Have you forgotten the original color of your oven? Is it no longer possible to enjoy long evenings on your balcony? Just let us know what needs to be done and we'll help you out!
c4p2: Here you will find prices for extra services:
c4li2: cleaning of the freezer - SEK 150 (it must be defrosted),
c4li3: cleaning of oven + standard equipment and between glasses - SEK 200,
c4li5: balcony less than 6 sqm - SEK 500 (incl. window).
att1p1: We clean surfaces / equipment that are easily accessible to us from floor level. For such cleaning, we do not use ladders, small stairs, etc.
att1p2: Cleaning at the level above the line that we can reach is included in major cleaning, which is an additional service.
att1p3: We do not work with broken equipment, e.g. a broken vacuum cleaner or mop.
att1p4: We reserve the right to leave certain areas uncleaned or to omit certain steps in cleaning, if the customer does not provide the necessary cleaning supplies.
att1p5: We do not work if the customer's dog is inside the apartment or the house - however, it is ok for cats to be inside while we are cleaning.
att1p6: Please remember that many years of mismanagement cannot usually be fixed with the help of a regular, simple house cleaning. We cannot make something that is very worn look like new, so we ask you to remember that what we are doing is cleaning and removing dirt. We are very conscientious and honest in our work, but we are not capable of performing miracles üòâ
att1li1: Cleaning the sink, countertops and taps
att1li3: External wiping of all kitchen cabinets' doors from outside
att1li4: Cleaning of all open surfaces, e.g. tables, chairs, windowsills, etc.
att1li6: Cleaning of doors (spot cleaning only, i.e. where there are stains)
att1li8: Wiping the garbage space under the sink
att1li9: Emptying the coffee machine (coffee grounds/ coffee capsules) + washing the coffee pot
att1li10: Washing the microwave (both inside and on top) if easily accessible (i.e. accessible from floor level)
att1li11: We put the dishes in the dishwasher + empty the dishwasher a maximum of once per cleaning occasion
att1li12: Cleaning of the shower cubicle and bathtub
att1li14: Cleaning taps and pipes that are easily accessible if easily accessible from floor level
att1li15: Cleaning/drying of walls and tiles (spot washing only, e.g. where there are visible stains)
att1li17: External dusting of bathroom furniture and appliances
att1li20: Vacuuming of floors, carpets, skirting boards/mouldings
att1li22: Dusting of furniture, lamps, windowsills, radiators, doors, frames, moldings, connectors and free surfaces if easily accessible (i.e. accessible from floor level)
att1li23: Changing the beds - the option to change the bed linen, depending on the room, is available
att2li1: We do not wash lamps (the washing of lamps is only carried out when they are easily accessible from the floor surface).
att2li2: We never wash crystal lamps or crystal chandeliers.
att2li3: We do not wash large amounts of dishes by hand (no longer than a quarter per cleaning session).
att2li4: We do not water flowers or potted plants.
att2li5: We do not wash clothes (exception for laundry: we can start washing dirty bed linen after changing the bed linen, but only if there is a washing machine in the apartment).
att2li7: We do not carry out any small repairs such as e.g. replacement of light bulbs.
att2li8: We do not remove candle stains.
att2li9: We don't wash floors on our knees.
att2li11: We don't fold clothes and we don't put clothes or laundry in wardrobes or cupboards.
att2li12: We do not clean after pets - this refers to e.g. litter boxes, cages, aquariums, etc. (we do not change shavings in rabbit cages, water in aquariums (fish, turtle), etc. We do not feed animals and we do not change their water. We do not walk dogs.
att2li13: We do not move around any furniture or big appliances (e.g. refrigerator or washing machine).
att2li14: We don't lift carpets and we don't whip or shake them either.
att2li15: TV screens, other screens - we only dry-wipe them. We can use special cleaning-agents intended for that, but only those that we receive from the customer and only for the sole responsibility of the customer.
att2li16: When we clean the fridge (extra service) we do not sort food and we also do not throw away any food, e.g. food that is moldy or past its best-before date.
att2li17: The cleaning refers to your home - all storage rooms, garages, yards and similar spaces are not included in home cleaning (refers to customers with detached houses).
att2li18: Scrubbing of joints is not included in house cleaning - however, this can be ordered as an extra service.
s5h2: What do others think of us?
s5c1p2: Aleksandra is truly the best in the world!
s5c1p3: Not only does she clean excellently, but she is also the world's cutest! When I was involved in an accident, she went the extra mile and took care of me! There aren't many people with hearts like hers ‚ù§Ô∏è highly recommend Aleksandra! I couldn't have done it without her!
s5c1p6: Have used them several times and been extremely satisfied each time.
s5c1p8: Have had her for many years and have also recommended her to my closest friends. She is pleasant, thorough and always solves our needs! We have used her for moving cleaning, weekly cleaning, office cleaning and also assembling IKEA furniture. Will never change cleaning company! Can give my warmest recommendations üå∏
s5c1p10: Reliable and flexible üå∏ have recommended her to several friends as she is extremely professional and the cleaning is always top notch! üëåüèª
s5c1p11: I can warmly recommend Aleksandra Cislowski St√§dfirma!
s5c1p12: It is always nicely cleaned. Professional! Her window cleaning is something extra! She is very flexible and nice. Super easy to communicate via Mail or SMS. Leaves reminders of what is needed for the next cleaning occasion and surprises with greeting cards!
s5c1p13: My husband and I both work full time and we both agreed that we would hire cleaning help for about two days in a month. Like so many others, however, we thought it was a big step to let a stranger be alone in our apartment for several hours. We were also both a little suspicious about the cleaning industry in general considering that the industry is notorious for its poor conditions and many times it has come to light that vulnerable people have been exploited in a way that is not dignified. Fortunately, we have been lucky enough to come into contact with Aleksandra and her company. Aleksandra speaks fluent English (she is learning Swedish) so communication has never been a problem and best of all, she seems to enjoy her profession. She has a fantastic ability to know her customer and come up with opinions and housewife tips on e.g. which chemicals and cleaning equipment should be purchased. It is certainly possible to find a slightly cheaper alternative, but for those who appreciate trust and professionalism and want to be sure that the business is honest, my husband and I can warmly recommend Aleksandra üå∏
aq1: Do you clean windows that are up really high?
ap1: We do not perform window cleaning at high altitudes. We neither hold rock climbing qualifications nor the special equipment required to work at high altitudes.
ap2: We do not perform pool cleaning.
aq3: Do you clean fireplaces from the ashes?
ap3: We do not clean fireplaces, stoves or chimneys.
aq4: Can you perform windows cleaning when is freezing outside?
ap4: During winter, we do not wash windows or balconies.
aq5: Could you also take care of my garden?
ap5: We do not perform any gardening jobs.
aq6: Any additional help with snow during the winter?
ap6: We do not perform snow removal or snow shoveling.
aq7: Could you deep wash some of my furniture?
ap7: We do not wash carpets, mattresses, quilts or other textiles, as we lack the equipment for this.
s7p5: Check out also our FB page!
